typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of tool} as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service themes} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		id as short,
		Course_name as string,
		Username as string,
		Email as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		Title as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		idnumber as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as short,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		Functional_title as string,
		Howlong as string,
		Priorexperience as string,
		Address as string,
		Cityname as string,
		Country as string,
		{Country code} as short,
		Pobox as string,
		Postalcode as integer,
		Nationality as string,
		Skype as string,
		Aim as string,
		Yahoo as string,
		Msn as string,
		Profile_field_Supervisor as string,
		{Service theme} as string,
		Cityregion as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		Size as string,
		Certification_date as date,
		Certified as boolean,
		Cohort as string,
		Uniqueid as string,
		User_id as integer,
		Enrol_time as date,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		DATE_SR_KEY as integer,
		DATE_TIME as date,
		DAY_OF_MONTH as integer,
		CALENDER_MONTH_NAME as string,
		CALENDER_MONTH_ID as integer,
		CALENDER_YEAR as integer,
		CALENDER_QUARTER_ID as string,
		CALENDER_QUARTER_NAME as string,
		CALENDER_HALF_YEAR_ID as string,
		CALENDER_HALF_YEAR_NAME as string,
		FISCAL_MONTH_ID as string,
		FISCAL_MONTH_NAME as string,
		FISCAL_QUARTER_ID as string,
		FISCAL_QUARTER_NAME as string,
		FISCAL_HALF_YEAR_ID as string,
		FISCAL_HALF_YEAR_NAME as string,
		FISCAL_YEAR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> dimdate
source1 select(mapColumn(
		{Date of data collection},
		Certification_date,
		{Year of birth},
		Enrol_time
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDateCol
dimdate select(mapColumn(
		DATE_SR_KEY,
		DATE_TIME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selectdatetime
SelectDateCol, Selectdatetime lookup(toTimestamp(toString(byName('Certification_date')), 'yyyy-MM-dd') == toTimestamp(toString(byName('DATE_TIME')), 'MM/DD/YYYY'),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
